item.title: Men’s Short Sleeve T-Shirt
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: T-shirts - Russell Classic T-Shirt sets the standard for fabric and production quality, durability and wearer comfort. Its perfect combination of ring-spun cotton, high quality fabric and top level finishing will be a perfect choice for you.
item.content:encoded:
T-shirts – Russell Classic T-Shirt sets the standard for fabric and production quality, durability and wearer comfort. Its perfect combination of ring-spun cotton, high quality fabric and top level finishing will be a perfect choice for you. Shoulder to shoulder taping, tubular body construction, unisex product – all these features make this T-shirt very comfortable. Fabric: 100% pure ring-spun cotton.

  • Plain colour t-shirts are 100% Cotton, Heather Grey is 90% Cotton/10% Polyester, Charcoal Heather is 52% Cotton/48% Polyester
  • 4.3oz/145gsm (mid-weight) soft fabric with vintage look
  • Custom size
  • Ethically sourced
